GSD.product_version: versions from v4.5 to before v5.4.227
GSD.description:
net: mvneta: Prevent out of bounds read in mvneta_config_rss()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.4.227 by commit eec1fc21edc2bb99c9e66cf66f0b5d4d643fbb50, it was introduced in version v4.5 by commit cad5d847a093077b499a8b0bbfe6804b9226c03e. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: net: mvneta: Prevent out of bounds read in mvneta_config_rss()
